text:
March 3, 1969
Mr. Herman W. Land
Herman W. Land Associates, Inc.
220 Old Country Road
Minaola, New York 11501
Dear Mr. Lands
Enclosed is a copy of the NER proposal to move the
National Educational Radio Network to Washington, D. C
which was submitted to the Corporation for Public
Broadcasting in late January.
For your information I have also included a list of
those individuals whom Mr. Mott and I contacted to
encourage early submittal of program proposals for
CPB grants. Each person contacted was requested to
send detailed copies of their proposal to you as well.
Several of those who were contacted indicated they
knew of others w&th ready proposals and would contact
them urging immediate submission*
Sincerely,
Lucinda K. Landreth
Administrative Assistant
Enclosures
